column5: hello all I have some relatives coming from France  -senior is avid angler in europe. they may stay at Little's cottages on stony lake any ideas on where to fish  generaly in that area? all fish -photo-release thanks for anyassistance!
yes  \they are now staying in lakefield.. any place around there to rent boats thanks again
Not sure about boat rentals.  Getting pretty late in the season.  |Could try Viamede or some other resort to see if they are still renting.
am renting boat at macrackens landing any  reports on how general fishing has been lately thanks

Stoney Lake (also spelled Stony Lake) is a lake inOntario, Canada. There are three interconnected lakes (Upper Stoney Lake to the northeast, Stony Lake in the centre, and Clear Lake to the southwest). Stoney Lake forms the eastern end of the Kawartha lakes region. It is primarily a summer cottage area but there are many permanent residences especially on Clear Lake.
